Catalogue

You will find the full collection in our catalogue

The byE catalogue contains our most recent range of furniture and accessories that can ordered and shipped to anywhere in the world completely branded with your own label. Browse through our full catalogue to find the furniture and accessories that compliment your own collection.

Our story

As a Dutch kid Bastiaan grew up in Indonesia, making it his first home and giving him a thorough understanding of the Javanese culture, crafts, materials and possibilities. Combining his family’s extensive manufacturing experience and production facilities and his own design and economics background has laid the foundation for ByE..
